name: The White Walker Gun-up Glory
description:
Fight as a one man army defender and show your enemies why they should never mess with the white walker heroes’ soul.
It’s a complete fps game story of a grand soldier, a stubborn who is willing to do whatever it takes to bring down creed the entire enemy lines. You, as a soldier, will be given several missions to accomplish and also there is a large storage of weapons, bomb, ammo & more object you can pick the one you’re passionate about. Does not worry if you are a newbie, through guide option, train yourself for the best counter ambush! On the field, you control your every movements including, jumping, running forward and getting on your knees because sometimes, in order to avoid bullets, those movements help you. Never forget to reload your guns after fire for hitting target enemies squad.

Features examples of the white walker shooting ops:
- High quality smooth animations graphics
- Easy to control character: smoothly hide, shoot, run, jump and attack!
- Many gears and guns collect in store!
- Beautiful graphics & sounds quality gives real warfare experience!
- Daily colossal combat rewards!
- Extensive time killer in the world!
